sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Box, Button, Flex, Text, Input, InputProps } from 'jazzdefi/jazzdefi-uikit' import useI18n from 'hooks/useI18n' interface TokenInputProps extends InputProps { max: number | string symbol: string value: string onSelectMax?: () => void onChange: (evt: React.FormEvent) => void depositFeeBP?: number } const TokenInput: React.FC = ({ max, symbol, onChange, onSelectMax, value, depositFeeBP = 0 }) => { const TranslateString = useI18n() return ( {max.toLocaleString()} {symbol} {TranslateString(526, 'Available')} {symbol}
) } export default TokenInput
